timber.log

Class Timber

  • java.lang.Object
    • timber.log.Timber

  • public final class Timber
extends java.lang.Object
    Logging for lazy people.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Timber.DebugTree
      A Timber.Tree for debug builds.
      static class  Timber.HollowTree
      A Timber.Tree which does nothing.
      static interface  Timber.TaggedTree
      A facade for attaching tags to logging calls.
      static interface  Timber.Tree
      A facade for handling logging calls.
